mapper.select: SELECT T2.id, T2.bus_no, T2.status_enum, T2.supplier_id, T2.purpose_location_id, T2.approver_id, T2.approval_time, T2.applicant_id, T2.apply_time, T2.purpose_location_id, T2.tenant_id FROM (SELECT T1.id, T1.bus_no, T1.status_enum, T1.supplier_id, T1.purpose_location_id, T1.approver_id, T1.approval_time, T1.applicant_id, T1.apply_time, T1.purpose_location_id, T1.tenant_id FROM wor_supply_request AS T1 WHERE type_enum = #{purchaseInventory} GROUP BY T1.id, T1.bus_no, T1.status_enum, T1.supplier_id, T1.purpose_location_id, T1.approver_id, T1.approval_time, T1.applicant_id, T1.apply_time, T1.purpose_location_id, T1.tenant_id ORDER BY T1.bus_no desc ) AS T2 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
